title: Start
body:
<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Talia neutral left>> Whoa, those guys are big!
[[Next|1]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Talia neutral left>> I can't possibly beat them like this... What should I do?
[[Next|2]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Talia neutral left>> Is that... Prince <<setsprite DialgoueRunner Richard neutral right>>? Third in line to the Fairy Throne?
[[Next|4]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Richard neutral right>>: Help! These guys just started attacking me!
[[Next|5]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Talia neutral left>> Must be Carabosse's doing... But I don't have any way to help him!
[[Next|6]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Richard neutral right>>: If only I knew how to use this staff! What a useless family heirloom for me to have at this moment.
[[Next|7]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Talia neutral left>> A staff! I could probably figure out how to use that!
[[Next|8]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Talia neutral left>> Excuse me, Your Majesty! I can use a staff!
[[Next|9]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Richard neutral right>>: Take it! Just save me from these monsters!
[[Next|10]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Talia neutral left>> One condition!
[[Next|11]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Richard neutral right>>: I'll do anything!
[[Next|12]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Talia neutral left>> Can I set you up on a date?
[[Next|13]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Richard neutral right>>: Whoa there! I mean, you're cute and all but you're not really my type...
[[Next|14]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Talia neutral left>> Not me! My best friend. It's a long story, just say yes and save all of our lives!
[[Next|15]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Richard neutral right>>: Okay fine, I'll go on this date! Now take this staff and protect me!
[[Next|16]]
<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Talia neutral left>> (Wow, this prince is kind of a weenie.. But that's not important right now! Here goes!)
